data.name: Harem Wars
data.detailed_description:
A new chapter of your life begins, after your cat starts speaking to you, you know things are never going to be the same again when she then turns into a beautiful woman and informs you that you will be part of the Harem Wars.

The Harem Wars


A powerful group of supernatural enfused people, battle for dominance over the minds and bodies of their rivals, the one to rule them all, will be the one who gets to arise as a divine god of love and passion and ascend to their rightful place in the heavens.

As the newest member of the Harem Wars you must find and defeat the other thirteen sorceresses before they can defeat and subjigate you.

Features
  • Huge open world to explore
  • Meet the girls in their own locations
  • Fight in magical battles to absorb their powers
  • Manage your finances, work a job so you can keep fighting.
  • Multiple endings available based on your decisions
  • Can you arise as the divine god of passion?

About the Game


Harem Wars features a non-linear story, following a series of three acts, each one triggering the continuation of the story when certain milestones are reached. During which you will have to battle a variety of characters in magical combat. Victory will gain you more power within the game and make future battles easier as you build up your power to take on your main rival. Whilst battling these various people you will also need to manage your life, pay your bills, work for money and do whatever you can to survive this new supernatural world you find yourself in.
